level.text: If a proceeding is a contested case within the meaning of the D.C. Administrative Procedure Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 2-502(8)), the following restrictions shall apply:
A person shall not make or knowingly cause to be made to a member of the Board an ex parte communication relevant to the merits of the proceeding; and
No member of the Board shall make or cause to be made to any interested persons outside the Board an ex parte communication relevant to the merits of the proceeding.
The prohibitions set forth in ยง 1720.1 shall apply upon the issuance of notice of an application for an original, transfer, or renewal license or a notice to show cause hearing.
“Ex parte communication” does not include a request for a status report on a matter, proceeding, or notice of a meeting or hearing.
